CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, page 19, reads: "6. One of the most popular booths at the fair was the New Diamond Market's display. Shown here are Thomas Eisel, hostess Betty Stokes, Stanley Harp, M.A. Glick and Phil Speck"
TitMainTitle: Three men and Betty Stokes standing in New Diamond Market booth in Syria Mosque for the 1956 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
